title: 服务端疑似MySQL数据库崩溃
author: chenxiutao030
txt_content:

replies.author: chenxiutao030
replies.txt_content:
补充一下，貌似由：ava.lang.NoSuchMethodError: com.sk89q.worldedit.LocalSession.getMask()Lcom/sk89q/worldedit/masks/Mask;
来引起的

replies.author: 薛乐仁
replies.txt_content: 把CoreProtect文件夹里的database删了试试？
